author: Matt Dixon
title: DeSantis says one thing, then says another, and mayors ask for clarity
description: 'It's an odd way to run a pandemic.'
content:
Gov. Ron DeSantis speaks during a news conference at a drive-through coronavirus testing site. | AP Photo
TALLAHASSEE A statewide stay-at-home directive has sown confusion in Florida, with Gov. Ron DeSantis and his aides telling mayors that the orders plain … [+5219 chars]
